short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a calendar with a background image on new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photography Calendar Extension

Enhance your browsing experience with a stunning calendar featuring breathtaking landscape and nightscape photography. Each month, enjoy a new background image taken by the photographer, showcasing the beauty of nature and the night sky.

Features:

Monthly updated calendar with a fresh photography background.
High-quality landscape and nightscape images.
The current day is highlighted for easy reference.
Perfect for photography enthusiasts and nature lovers.
Add a touch of art to every new tab while keeping track of the days!
